This is a Mexican cuisine, which includes a variety of dishes such as tacos, enchiladas, burritos, tamales, and quesadillas. It is usually characterized by the use of chili peppers, beans, and corn.

This is a Mexican cuisine, which is a style of food that is a fusion of indigenous Mesoamerican cooking with European, especially Spanish, elements added after the Spanish conquest of the Aztec Empire in the 16th century.
